greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n times sum of digits of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
F. B. Diniz, About a new family of sequences, arXiv:1607.06082 [math.GM], 2016.
maple: for n from 0 to 150 do printf(`%d,`,n*add(convert(n, base, 10)[i], i=1..nops(convert(n,base, 10)))) od:
program: a057147 n = a007953 n * n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 19 2014
[n*sum([int(d) for d in str(n)]) for n in range(10**5)] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Aug 05 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 13 2000
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_ and Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 13 2000
